mapper.insert: insert into article(article_id, owner, ariticle_title, content, likes_num, scan_num, reply_id) values (#{articleId}, #{owner}, #{ariticleTitle}, #{content}, #{likesNum}, #{scanNum}, #{replyId});
mapper.update: update article set ariticle_title=#{ariticleTitle}, content=#{content}, likes_num=#{likesNum}, scan_num=#{scanNum}, reply_id=#{replyId} where article_id = #{articleId}
